account_code_blocks.name: sample_manifest
account_code_blocks.content: <script> console.log('**SAMPLE MANIFEST OUTPUT TEST**'); console.log('Text Spacing: {{text_spacing_val}}'); console.log('Textbox Example: {{textbox_example}}'); console.log('Number Example: {{number_example}}'); console.log('Toggle Example: {{toggle_example}}'); console.log('Debug Example: {{debug_mode}}'); </script><script></script>
account_code_blocks.description: This is a sample manifest outputting fields to the console

config_fields.name: specifc_cta_toggle
config_fields.label: Toggle to only target specific CTA(s)
config_fields.description: If enabled, only the below entered IDs will be targeted. If disabled, ALL CTAs will be targeted with the CTA customizations

config_fields.name: specific_cta_array
config_fields.label: List of CTA IDs
config_fields.description: Entered IDs will apply the below customizations to said CTAs

control_props.placeholder: Enter ID's separated by commas, ie: 12345, 23456

config_fields.name: text_spacing_toggle
config_fields.label: Enable Letter Spacing
config_fields.description: If enabled, the letters of CTA tiles will have letter spacing based on values set below

config_fields.name: text_spacing_omit_form_toggle
config_fields.label: Omit text spacing for all form CTAs
config_fields.description: If enabled, text spacing will be omitted for all form CTAs

config_fields.name: text_spacing_val
config_fields.label: Letter Spacing Value (px)
config_fields.description: Enter the Letter Spacing Value

config_fields.name: font_size_toggle
config_fields.label: Enable custom font size
config_fields.description: If enabled, button font sizes will be applied based on values set below. NOTE: Check CTA on multiple window sized to ensure font size selected work on all page sizes

config_fields.name: font_size_omit_form_toggle
config_fields.label: Omit custom font sizes for form CTAs
config_fields.description: If enabled, custom button font size will be omitted for all form CTAs

config_fields.name: font_size_val
config_fields.label: Font size value (px)
config_fields.description: Set the button font size

config_fields.name: multi_level_text_toggle
config_fields.label: Enable CTA Multi Level Text
config_fields.description: If enabled, function will check for the symbol provided below and separate the text into its respective levels.

config_fields.name: multi_level_text_omit_form_toggle
config_fields.label: Omit multi level text for form CTAs
config_fields.description: If enabled, multi level text will be omitted for all form CTAs

config_fields.name: multi_level_symbol_val
config_fields.label: Multi level text symbol
config_fields.description: Set the multi level symbol to check for.

config_fields.name: multi_level_text_val
config_fields.label: Multi level text customizations
config_fields.description: Set the multi level font customization parameters (optional).

control_props.placeholder: Enter font customizations [['{font size}px', '{font weight}px', '{margin bottom}px']]

config_fields.name: button_corner_toggle
config_fields.label: Enable Rounded Button Corners
config_fields.description: If enabled, the letters of CTA tiles will have letter spacing based on values set below

config_fields.name: button_corner_omit_form_toggle
config_fields.label: Omit rounded button corners for all form CTAs
config_fields.description: If enabled, rounded button corners will be omitted for all form CTAs

config_fields.name: button_corner_val
config_fields.label: Button Rounded Corner Radius
config_fields.description: Set the corner radius of your content tiles using CSS border-radius format

config_fields.name: button_padding_toggle
config_fields.label: Enable custom padding
config_fields.description: If enabled, button padding will be applied based on values set below

config_fields.name: button_padding_val
config_fields.label: Button sizing value
config_fields.description: Set the button padding

config_fields.name: button_padding_omit_form_toggle
config_fields.label: Omit button padding for form CTAs
config_fields.description: If enabled, button padding will omitted for all form CTAs

config_fields.name: form_cta_label_text
config_fields.label: Enable form CTA label replacement
config_fields.description: If enabled, the function will replace label placeholders with those entered.

control_props.placeholder: Enter array of replacements [['Old placeholder', 'New placeholder']]

config_fields.name: debug_mode
config_fields.label: Debug Mode for Developers
config_fields.description: For developer debugging purposes, when enabled check the console logs for detailed info on the operation of this app.
